Room.Name: Stairway of the Nobles
Room.ShortDescription: You are on the top level of the Stairway of the Nobles.
Room.LongDescription: The hallway you see leads to the family chambers and apartments of Prince Rutger, master of this Tower Castle. There are several doors and open rooms on the south side of the hallway, and it looks like another short stairway leads to the roof. A secretary's desk blocks your entry to the hallway.
